name: Train Like
description:
The game was made for Technically a Game Jam 2022

Features:

  • Build railroads
  • Buy trains
  • Add more train wagons
  • Upgrade stations
  • Upgrade trains
  • Earn money transporting stuff

Controls/Instructions:

  • WASD -> Move camera around the map
  • Press the Build Tool toggle to be able to paint railroads ;)
  • After you buy a train, set its route to start/end stations!
  • Mouse left click-> Click UI thingies
  • Mouse right click -> Cancel some stuff

Code: moure

Design: atalantos

Art: Kenney (Asset Jesus)

Music: Nicole Marie T

Sfx: ChipTone
